mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.`name`, c.icon icon, c.page_url pageURL, c.open_type openType, c.type, c.order_num orderNum, '-1' maxOpen, 'false' extend, null childs, c.parent_id parentId, c.level, c.icon_color iconColor, c.icon_bg iconBg, c.icon_pic iconPic, c.icon_type iconType, IFNULL(c.desktop_id, '') deskTopId, IFNULL(g.sys_url, '') sysWinUrl # 分布式开发时，其他系统的域名地址 FROM sys_eve_role_menu b, sys_eve_menu c, sys_eve_win g WHERE b.role_id = #{roleId} AND b.menu_id = c.id AND g.id = c.sys_win_id ORDER BY c.order_num ASC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT c.id, c.`name`, c.logo, c.url, CASE c.parent_id WHEN '0' THEN c.desktop_id ELSE c.parent_id END pId, c.order_by orderNum, 'page' type FROM app_workbench_page_role b, app_workbench_page c WHERE b.page_id = c.id AND b.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY c.order_by ASC) m UNION ALL SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.id, a.`name`, a.logo, a.app_page_url url, '0' pId, a.order_by orderNum, 'desktop' type FROM sys_eve_desktop a, app_workbench_page_role b WHERE a.enabled = '1' AND b.page_id = a.id AND b.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY a.order_by DESC) k

SELECT a.id, a.`name`, a.parent_id parentId, a.menu_num menuNum, a.auth_menu authMenu, a.order_by orderBy FROM sys_eve_menu_auth_point a, sys_eve_role_menu b WHERE b.menu_id = a.id AND b.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY a.order_by ASC

SELECT c.id, c.`name`, c.parent_id parentId, c.menu_num menuNum, c.auth_menu authMenu, c.order_by orderBy FROM app_workbench_page_auth_role b, sys_eve_menu_auth_point c WHERE b.role_id = #{roleId} AND b.auth_id = c.id ORDER BY c.order_by ASC
